## RouteConfigOptionsBody.timeout property

Payload reception timeout in milliseconds. Sets the maximum time allowed for the client to transmit the request payload (body) before giving up and responding with a Request Timeout (408) error response. Set to false to disable.

Default value: 10000 (10 seconds).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
timeout?: false | number;
```
